message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you, which I understand is around $800000. Let me know if you're interested!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, based on my valuation of the product, I am only able to consider a price of $950000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. However, I was hoping we could meet in the middle. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1050000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you place on the product and the original price I was looking for.
I appreciate your response, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a price of $1000000 for the product. This is the highest I can go while still staying within my budget.

I understand that you've reached your budget limit, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to sell yet. I'm willing to meet you at $1050000, but I'm not going any lower. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping you'll consider it.
